name: [is value]
tag_list: strategy, consulting, it-governance, performance, productivity, cost-killer, information-technology, it, erp
overview: [is value] is a French strategy consulting firm, dedicated to IT impacts on companies’ value. How to evaluate IT investments impacts on shareholders value? Is the information system performant? How far can information technology contribute to business objectives? How to anticipate the impacts of an IT project on processes, organization and business performance? How to improve IT governance? [is value] do not sell or encourage its customers in buying specific IT solutions : [is value] help them doing the choice that best fit their context. In order to deliver value added consultancy, [is value] shall not work for ERP editors nor software editors nor IT consulting firms.
